Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Main Street, west of the Rosecrest Intersection.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street ends to the east of here at the intersection with Rosecrest Street. Main travels west and eventually turns south, traveling through the main centers in the southwestern quadrant of town. On the north side of Main, you can see the Oceancrest Central Recycling Plant and Reclaimation Center. On the south is the Eiden Public Storage Facility where various articles may be stored for a fee.
